statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.80} per pound with some Breakfast coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.40} per pound to create \displaystyle{60} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${12.48} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
